Quote: Believe what you wish to believe.
See? He is your son. A son you are willing to protect even at the risk of your own life.
I am merely trying to keep him safe.
Not only does his birth make no sense, but it never should have happened either.
She did not poison me. I poisoned myself. Please help. Mu-deok risked her life to do what I asked.
She risked her life for him even though they only just met. It is strange.
She easily deceives people. She did not speak even though she was tortured.
There is more to her than meets the eye.
The people of Songrim are too nice. If this is how they torture peopleâ€¦
I am the only person who is safe enough to come this close to you.
All my life, no one ever seemed to know how desperate I was. No one has ever risked their lives for me like you did.
People think I got kicked out every time, but I was the one who left.

The moment I get my energy back and become Naksu again, we will no longer be master and pupil. Because then, you should no longer have a reason to protect me, nor should I have a reason to go easy on you.
I, Jang Uk, your pupil, will serve and protect my master, Mu-deok, with all my heart.
If you master your spells, you will neither feel cold on ice nor hot walking on fire.
In order to become the best mage, you must go through several steps.
First is Jipsu, the ability to gather the energy of water. Second is Ryusu, the ability to gain energy from the flow of water. Then comes Chisu, the ability to control the energy in the atmosphere.
I did not feel motivated to do so. As you already know, I need to feel motivated in order to do something.
I am a quick learner. I will quickly master Jipsu. How long does it take?
He was a genius who only took a year to master Jipsu.
If he took a year, I will do it in six months. No, I will do it in three months.
I am determined, so do not discourage me.
Please do not resent me for that.
It is normal to pick on the weak. That is how the world works.
This wine was made with spring water from a volcanic island in Southern Daeho. It is dark wine, the best wine you can find in Daeho. This is a rare delicacy.
You will have to take your sister's place and become the leader that guards Jinyowon for the family. Find a man who will support your cause.
If he is not busy, he normally sleeps early and wakes up early too.
I lived a harsh life, so I learned a few moves just to keep myself safe.
Your mother, Do-hwa, was extremely kind-hearted. Always remember that and ignore what everyone else says.
So be careful who you fall for. Only I get to come this close.
Fine. I will only allow it to you.
What? Why does that require effort?
Why not? It makes no sense. Come on. Humor me.
His existence will bring chaos. He should not attract attention or challenge anyone. We must make people think that he is nothing special.
